description: President Anura Kumara Dissanayake to Address the Nation…
article_title: President Anura Kumara Dissanayake to Address the Nation Tomorrow
article_body_paragraphs: The newly elected President, Honourable Anura Kumara Dissanayake, will address the nation tomorrow (25), delivering a special statement.
This address will be broadcast live on all major electronic media channels at 7:30 PM.
